resources.string: Will display a list of songs matching your selection from the previous view. Clicking on the song will lead to the media player.

You can discover new music and artists. This will be a search engine for new music, top tracks and album listings.\ Come here when you are bored with your music and want to discover some new bands or singers
This will store all your music; albums, artists, playlits, and downloaded music.
Will house the radio tuned to a station matching your choice from the previous view.
